title: No longer get "Notify when updates for your apps..." NOR "Notify when Play auto. updates your apps"
content:
And yet I do not get either of these notifications for the past week.

(I am not sure it is related but recently I removed all references to this phone's # within our Google/Gmail Account under SECURITY and PERSONAL INFORMATION. This was done to "force" Google to not  use SMS as a 2 FA) .
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
